name: Akshay Urja Private Limited, Pune
overview:
Akshay Urja Private Limited

We are one of the renowned manufacturers and suppliers of a wide range of renewable energy source systems like solar energy, biogas, wind and biomass. These are catering to the applications such as hotels, swimming pools and water treatment plants.

Established in the year 1988, we, Akshay Urja Private Limited, Pune are counted amongst the leading manufacturers and suppliers of a wide range of renewable energy source systems like solar energy, biogas, wind and biomass.

We are engaged in manufacturing and supplying of a wide range of renewable energy source systems like solar energy, biogas, wind and biomass. These are applicable in hostels, hospitals, industries and domestic households.

Our range is widely appreciated for delivering constant performance, reliability and easy installation. These find application in the following areas:

â€¢ Hospitals â€¢ Hotels â€¢ Colleges, schools, hostels â€¢ Domestic purposes â€¢ Swimming pools â€¢ Water treatment plants

Quality being our forte, we leave no stone unturned in maintaining it in our range of renewable energy source systems like solar energy, biogas, wind and biomass. To conform to industry set quality standards, we have a team of quality inspectors who checks our range on well defined parameters and ensure the specifications are duly integrated in the production process.
